# outgoingMessageType

**Instance Property**

The format of the message contents.

## Declaration

```swift
var outgoingMessageType: INOutgoingMessageType { get }
```

## Discussion

If the user asks Siri to send an audio message,_ _the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INOutgoingMessageType/outgoingMessageAudio]. An audio message may also include a transcription of the audio message in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntent/content] property.

If the user doesn’t specify what type of message to send, the default message type is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INOutgoingMessageType/outgoingMessageText].

## Specifying Details About a Message

- **recipients**: The array of users to receive the message.
- **conversationIdentifier**: The identifier for the conversation.
- **speakableGroupName**: The name of the group to receive the message.
- **content**: The content of the message.
- **serviceName**: The service to use when sending the message.
- **sender**: The person or account that’s sending the message.
- **attachments**: Audio files to include in the message.
